# Historical Yamato/Japanese characters 1000008700-1000010699, 1000011900-1000012299, 1000012700-1000012999, 1000013200-1000014999
# First unused index: 1000014043

# Swap from Yamato to Japanese around 800-850 (for the Imperial Family, it would be the children of Junna and Ninmyo), but let people alive at that point remain Yamato since it is a parent culture and thus not a cause for rebellion

# JAPAN REVISION:

# - Add missing spouses with known parents ("Daughter/Sister of X")
# - Validate dates someone gets a title against https://japanese-wiki-corpus.github.io/person as many might be from the lunar calendar
# - Verify Dazaifu holders
# - Verify bloodline dates
# - Verify that all Permanent Regents hold at least one county in every (playable) date they're the Permanent Regent

##### The Imperial Family

# People before Emperor Keitai can be found later on
# All of these should have the amaterasu_descendant trait
# Includes people that later founded Minamoto/Taira/Tachibana branches, but not their descendants

### Emperor Keitai (1000008700) and his children (that have at least one verifiable date)

1000008700 = {
	name = "Ohodo" # Emperor Keitai
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000013313 # Hikoushi no Okimi
	trait = tough_soldier
	# Mother was Furihime, a seventh generation descendant of Emperor Suinin by his son Prince Iwatsukuwake
	450.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # According to Nihon Shoki; 485 according to Kojiki
	}
	# Married Princess Tashiraka (born 489), daughter of Emperor Ninken
	508.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013350 # Date unknown; had a son in 509
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Owari Menokohime,daughter of Owari Kusaka)
	# - Mio Wakakohime,younger sister of Mio Tsunoori)
	# - Hirohime, daughter of Prince Sakata
	# - Okinaga Omi no Iratsume, daughter of Okinaga Mate
	# - Manda Sekihime, daughter of Manda Omochi
	# - Mio Yamatohime, daughter of Mio Katahi
	# - Wani Haehime, daughter of Wani Kawachi
	# - Hirohime, daughter of Ne
	507.3.3 = {
		name = "Keitai"
	}
	531.3.10 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000008701 = {
	name = "Magari" # Emperor Ankan
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008700 # Emperor Keitai
	# Mother was Owari Menokohime, daughter of Owari Kusaka
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = fortune_builder
	466.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Married Princess Kasuga no Yamada, daughter of Emperor Ninken
	520.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013355 # Date unknown
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Kose Satehime (daughter of Kose Ohito)
	# - Kose Kakarihime (daughter of Kose Ohito)
	# - Yakahime (daughter of Mononobe Itabi)
	531.3.10 = {
		name = "Ankan"
	}
	536.1.25 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000008702 = {
	name = "Takata" # Emperor Senka
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008700 # Emperor Keitai
	# Mother was Owari Menokohime, daughter of Owari Kusaka
	trait = child_of_consort
	467.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Married Princess Tachibana, daughter of Emperor Ninken
	511.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013352 # Date unknown
	}
	# Consorts: Wakakohime
	536.1.26 = {
		name = "Senka"
	}
	539.3.15 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000008703 = {
	name = "Hironiwa" # Emperor Kinmei; the first emperor with verifiable dates
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008700 # Emperor Keitai
	mother = 1000013350 # Princess Tashiraka
	509.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Married Princess Ishihime, daughter of Emperor Senka
	536.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000008704 # Before 538
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Princess Wayakahime, daughter of Emperor Senka
	538.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000008705 # Before 539
	}
	# - Princess Hikage, daughter of Emperor Senka
	542.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013377 # Date unknown; had a child
	}
	# - Princess Oishihime, daughter of Emperor Senka
	537.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013374 # Date unknown; no resulting children
	}
	# - Soga Kitashihime, daughter of Soga Iname
	# - Soga Oane, daughter of Soga Iname
	# - Kasuga Nukano, daughter of Kasuga Hifuri
	539.12.30 = { # Or December 5, but that's likely a mistake (due to the lunar date)
		name = "Kinmei"
	}
	571.5.24 = { # Or April 15, but that appears to be a mistake
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

### There is no information about children of Emperor Ankan

### Children of Emperor Senka (1000008702) that have somewhat good dates

1000008704 = {
	name = "Ishihime"
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008702 # Emperor Senka
	mother = 1000013352 # Princess Tachibana
	520.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Unknown; had a child before 538
	}
	# Married Emperor Kinmei
	572.1.1 = {
		death = yes # Unknown; had a child in 538
	}
}

		death = yes # Unknown; had a child in 539
	}

### Children of Emperor Kinmei (1000008703) with dates

1000008706 = {
	name = "Tamakatsu"
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008703 # Emperor Kinmei
	mother = 1000008704 # Princess Ishihime
	537.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Before 537, based on birth order
	}
	552.4.13 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000008707 = {
	name = "Futotamashiki" # Emperor Bidatsu
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008703 # Emperor Kinmei
	mother = 1000008704 # Princess Ishihime
	trait = charismatic_negotiator # Established relations with Silla and Baekje
	538.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Married Okinaga Hirohime, daughter of Okinaga Mate, and Princess Nukatabe, daughter of Emperor Kinmei
	# Consorts:
	# - Princess Nukatabe, daughter of Emperor Kinmei
	569.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000008710 # Before 570
	}
	# - Kasuga Ominako, daughter of Kasuga Nakakimi
	# - Unako Otoshi, daughter of Ohoka no Obito no Okuma
	572.4.30 = {
		name = "Bidatsu"
	}
	576.1.1 = { # Princess Nukatabe becomes empress
		remove_consort = 1000008710
		add_spouse = 1000008710
	}
	585.9.14 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000008708 = {
	name = "Iso"
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008703 # Emperor Kinmei
	mother = 1000008705 # Princess Wayakahime
	trait = child_of_consort
	539.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # 539 or 540
	}
	570.1.1 = {
		death = yes # Unknown
	}
}

1000008709 = {
	name = "Ikebe" # Emperor Yomei
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008703 # Emperor Kinmei
	# Mother was Soga Kitashihime
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = naive_appeaser
	540.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Married Princess Anahobe, daughter of Emperor Kinmei
	573.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000008714 # Princess Anahobe; before 574 as they had a child at that point
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Soga Ishikina, daughter of Soga Iname
	# - Katsuragi Hiroko, daughter of Katsuragi Atahe
	585.10.3 = {
		name = "Yomei"
	}
	587.5.21 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		add_trait = smallpox
		death = {
			death_reason = death_trait
		}
	}
}

1000008710 = {
	name = "Nukatabe" # Empress Suiko
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008703 # Emperor Kinmei
	# Mother was Soga Kitashihime
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = intricate_webweaver # Managed to stay on the throne until she died despite various power struggles
	trait = ambitious
	554.5.21 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	592.12.1 = {
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhuni # Became a Buddhist nun shortly before taking the throne
	}
	593.1.15 = {
		name = "Suiko"
	}
	628.4.15 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000008716 = {
	name = "Hatsusebe" # Emperor Sushun
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008703 # Emperor Kinmei
	# Mother was Soga Oane
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = ambitious
	trait = wroth
	trait = trusting
	trait = flamboyant_schemer # Publicly declared his wish to murder Soga Umako
	519.12.2 = {
		birth = yes # The Validator is unlikely to be happy, but this is correct
	}
	# Married Otomo Koteko, daughter of Otomo Nukateko
	# Consorts:
	# - Soga Kahakami, daughter of Soga Umako
	# - Mononobe Futushime, younger sister of Mononobe Moriya
	587.9.9 = {
		name = "Sushun"
	}
	592.12.12 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = {
			death_reason = death_murder
			# Killed on the orders of Soga Umako
		}
	}
}

1000008717 = {
	name = "Yakabe"
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008703 # Emperor Kinmei; might possibly have been Senka's son
	# Mother was Soga Oane
	trait = child_of_consort
	539.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Unknown; this works with the possibly that Senka was his father
	}
	587.7.18 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

### Children of Emperor Bidatsu (1000008707) with dates

1000008718 = {
	name = "Hikohito" # Father of Emperor Jomei
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008707 # Emperor Bidatsu
	# Mother was Princess Hirohime
	556.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	576.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000008711 # Princess Ohotomo
	}
	590.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000008720 # Princess Oharita
	}
	590.1.2 = { # The Validator doesn't like having both at the same date...
		add_consort = 1000008725 # Princess Nukatehime
	}
	591.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013399 # Princess Sakurai
	}
	602.1.1 = {
		death = yes # Between 593 and 607, and probably before 603 since Sakurai had time to remarry before then
	}
}

### Children of Emperor Yomei (1000008709) with dates

1000008726 = {
	name = "Umayado"
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008709 # Emperor Yomei
	mother = 1000008714 # Princess Anahobe
	trait = zealous
	trait = mastermind_theologian
	trait = charitable
	574.2.7 = {
		birth = yes
		name = "Shotoku"
	}
	# Married Princess Uji, daughter of Emperor Bidatsu
	591.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000008719
	}
	608.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013398 # Tachibana no Oiratsume date unknown
	}
	# Also married Tojiko Iratsume
	622.4.8 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

### Children of Emperor Sushun (1000008716) with dates

1000008731 = {
	name = "Hachiko"
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shugendo
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008716 # Emperor Sushun
	# Mother was Otomo Koteko
	trait = scholarly_theologian
	542.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}

	name = "Tamura" # Emperor Jomei
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato

	mother = 1000008725 # Princess Nukatehime
	trait = child_of_consort # Assuming his mother was a concubine
	trait = thrifty_clerk
	593.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Married Princess Takara/Empress Kogyoku/Saimei, daughter of Prince Chinu
	621.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000008734
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Soga Hote, daughter of Soga Umako
	# - Kaya Uneme, from Kaya
	# - Awata Kagushihime
	# - Soga Tetsuki, daughter of Soga Emishi
	628.4.15 = {
		name = "Jomei"
	}
	641.11.17 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000008778 = {
	name = "Takano" # Empress Koken/Shotoku
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008777 # Emperor Shomu
	mother = 1000009327 # Fujiwara Asukabehime (Komyo)
	trait = naive_appeaser
	trait = lustful
	trait = content
	trait = trusting
	718.1.1 = { # Or 718
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_koken # emperor_x used for all names for consistency
			set_character_flag = emperor_shotoku
		}
	}
	# Had an affair/a relationship with a priest named Dokyo
	749.8.19 = {
		name = "Koken"
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_koken_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_concubinage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_special_character_title = TENNO # Otherwise she won't get it in the 769 start
		}
	}
	758.9.7 = {
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	761.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			add_lover = 1000010642 # Dokyo
		}
	}
	765.1.26 = {
		name = "Shotoku"
		remove_trait = retired_emperor
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_shotoku_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	770.8.28 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

	trait = child_of_consort

		birth = yes
	}
	785.11.8 = {
		add_trait = disinherited # Disinherited due to being implicated in the murder of Fujiwara Tanetsugu
		death = yes
		name = "Sudo"
	}
}

### Children of Emperor Kanmu (1000008791)

1000008796 = {
	name = "Ote" # Emperor Heizei
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008791 # Emperor Kanmu
	mother = 1000009438 # Fujiwara Otomuro
	trait = lustful # Had a liason with Fujiwara Kusuko, mother of one of his consorts
	trait = organizer # Reorganized his bodyguard
	trait = humble # Abdicated in favour of his son
	774.9.25 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_heizei
		}
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Tarashiko, daughter of Fujiwara Momokawa
	791.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009771 # Date unknown
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Princess Asahara, daughter of Emperor Kanmu
	# - Princess Oyake, daughter of Emperor Kanmu
	806.4.9 = { # At the time of Emperor Kanmu's death
		add_consort = 1000008800
		add_consort = 1000008811
	}
	812.5.1 = { # May
		remove_consort = 1000008800 # Princess Asahara
		remove_consort = 1000008811 # Princess Oyake
	}
	# - Princess Kannabi, daughter of Emperor Kanmu
	816.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000008820 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Fujiwara Kusuko (former wife of Fujiwara Tadanushi), daughter of Fujiwara Tanetsugu
	807.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009447 # Date unknown; she died in 810
	}
	# - Daughter of Fujiwara Tadanushi
	# - Ise Tsuguko, daughter of Ise Ona
	# - Fuji Fujiko, daughter of Fuji Michiyori
	# - Ki Iokazu, daughter of Ki Kotsuo
	799.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000012030 # Date unknown
	}
	806.4.9 = {
		name = "Heizei"
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_heizei_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	809.5.18 = {
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	810.9.11 = { # Approx.
		# Became a buddhist monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	824.8.5 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		add_trait = ill
		death = {
			death_reason = death_trait
		}
	}
}

	name = "Kamino"	# Emperor Saga
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008791 # Emperor Kanmu
	mother = 1000009438 # Fujiwara Otomuro

	trait = ill
	786.10.3 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_saga
		}
	}
	# Married Tachibana Kachiko (Danrin), daughter of Tachibana Kiyotomo

		add_consort = 1000010568 # They had children before she became Empress Consort
	}
	815.8.21 = {
		remove_consort = 1000010568
		add_spouse = 1000010568

	806.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000014139 # Date unknown; works with daughter
	}
	# - Takashina Kawako, daughter of Takashina Kiyoshina
	# - Daughter of Hiroi Otona
	# - Fuse no Musashiko
	# - A woman from the Kamitsukeno clan
	# - Daughter of Abe Yanatsu
	# - Kasa Tsugiko, daughter of Kasa Nakamori
	# - A woman from the Awata clan
	# - Ohara Matako, daughter of Ohara Mamuro
	# - A woman from the Ki clan
	# - Kura no Kageko
	# - Kannabi no Iseko
	# - Funya Fumiko, daughter of Funya Kugamaro
	# - A woman from the Tanaka clan
	# - Daughter of Koreyoshi Sadamichi
	# - Onakatomi Mineko
	# - Tachibana Haruko
	# - Daughter of Nagaoka Okanari
	# - Daughter of Taima Osadamaro
	# - Sugawara Kanshi
	809.5.30 = {
		name = "Saga"
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_saga_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	823.5.29 = { # Or 823.5.23; conflicting dates given
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	842.8.24 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

	}
	# Saio of Ise 782-796
	782.8.1 = {
		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	796.3.15 = {
		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			remove_will_not_marry_effect = yes
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	# Married Emperor Heizei
	817.5.14 = {
		add_trait = ill
		death = {
			death_reason = death_trait
		}
	}
}

### Children of Emperor Saga (1000008797) with at least one date

1000008838 = {
	name = "Masara" # Emperor Ninmyo
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008797 # Emperor Saga
	mother = 1000010568 # Tachibana Kachiko
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = twin
	810.12.1 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_ninmyo
		}
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Nobuko, daughter of Fujiwara Fuyutsugu
	826.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009625 # Date unknown, but they had a son in 827
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Fujiwara Sawako, daughter of Fujiwara Fusatsugu
	827.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009507 # Unknown; they had a child in 828
	}
	# - Fujiwara Sadako, daughter of Fujiwara Mimori
	835.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009400 # Unclear date, but they had a child in 836
	}
	# - Shigeno Tsunako, daughter of Shigeno Sadanushi
	828.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000012126 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Tachibana Kageko, daughter of Tachibana Ujikimi
	840.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000010573 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Fujiwara Musuko
	# - Ki Taneko, daughter of Ki Natora
	834.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000012013 # Date unknown
	}
	# - A woman from the Mikuni clan
	# - Fujiwara Katoko, daughter of Fujiwara Fukutomaro
	833.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013731 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Fujiwara Warawako, daughter of Fujiwara Michito
	837.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013529 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Princess Takamune, daughter of Prince Okaya
	# - A woman from the Yamaguchi clan
	# - Daughter of Kudara Toyofuku
	# - Kudara Yokyo, daughter of Kudara Kyofuku/Kyoshun; Wikipedia lists her separately from the above
	829.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000012210 # Date unknown
	}
	833.3.30 = {
		name = "Ninmyo"
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_ninmyo_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	850.5.6 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		add_trait = ill
		death = {
			death_reason = death_trait
		}
	}
}

	trait = child_of_consort
	821.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
		# Unclear when he was given a surname
		dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = got_surname
		}
	}
	# In charge of Yamashiro in 850; he's obviously not getting that!
	# Had unclear sons
	872.9.8 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

### Children of Emperor Junna (1000008799); start of Japanese culture

1000008871 = {
	name = "Tsunesada"
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008799 # Emperor Junna
	mother = 1000008839 # Princess Masako
	trait = child_of_consort # His mother wasn't the empress consort when he was born
	825.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # The Validator is unhappy, but...
	}
	842.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013707 # Daughter of Fujiwara Koreo
	}
	842.8.25 = { # Immediately after Saga's death
		add_trait = disinherited
		#add_trait = bastard # To prevent descendants from being in the line of succession
	}
	849.1.1 = {
		# Became a Buddhist monk this year
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	884.10.12 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

	}

		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}

		remove_trait = imperial_priestess

### Children of Emperor Ninmyo (1000008838)

1000008883 = {
	name = "Michiyasu"	# Emperor Montoku
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008838 # Emperor Ninmyo
	mother = 1000009625 # Fujiwara Nobuko
	827.8.1 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_montoku
		}
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Akirakeiko, daughter of Fujiwara Yoshifusa
	845.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009630 # Date unknown; they had a child in 850
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Fujiwara Furuko, daughter of Fujiwara Fuyutsugu
	844.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013734 # Date unknown; they had no children
	}
	# - Fujiwara Takakiko, daughter of Fujiwara Yoshimi
	853.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009632 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Princess Azumako
	# - Fujiwara Toshiko
	# - Fujiwara Koreko
	# - Tachibana Fusako, daughter of Tachibana Ujikimi
	# - Tachibana Chushi, daughter of Tachibana Ujikimi
	# - Ki Shizuko, daughter of Ki Natora
	843.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000012014 # Date unknown; they had a son in 844
	}
	# - Shigeno Okuko, daughter of Shigeno Sadanushi
	849.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000012127 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Fujiwara Imako, daughter of Fujiwara Sadamori
	# - Fujiwara Retsushi, daughter of Fujiwara Koreo
	843.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013706 # Date unknown; oldest daughter scripted as born 844
	}
	# - Shigeno Mineko, daughter of Shigeno Sadao
	849.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000012124 # Date unknown
	}
	# - A woman from the Tomo clan
	# - A woman from the Fuse clan
	# - A woman from the Tajihi clan
	# - A woman from the Kiyohara clan
	# - A woman from the Sugawara clan
	850.5.31 = { # Enthroned
		name = "Montoku"
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_montoku_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	858.10.7 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000008885 = {
	name = "Tokiyasu" # Emperor Koko
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008838 # Emperor Ninmyo
	mother = 1000009507 # Fujiwara Sawako

	trait = lustful # Had a lot of children
	830.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_koko
		}
	}
	# Married Princess Hanshi, daughter of Prince Nakano, son of Emperor Kanmu
	850.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000008948 # Date unclear; they had a son the next year
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Fujiwara Kamiko, daughter of Fujiwara Mototsune

		add_consort = 1000009721 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Fujiwara Genjiko, daughter of Fujiwara Yamakage
	870.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013592 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Taira Motoko, daughter of Taira Yoshikaze
	# - Shigeno Naoko, daughter of Shigeno Sadanushi
	853.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000012128 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Daughter of Sanuki Naganao
	# - Fujiwara Motoko
	# - Sugawara Ruishi, daughter of Sugawara Koreyoshi
	# - Princess Keishin, daughter of Prince Masami
	855.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000014056 # Date unknown
	}
	# - A woman from the Tajihi clan
	# - A woman from the Fuse clan
	# - Daughter of Fujiwara Kadomune
	884.3.23 = { # Coronation
		name = "Koko"
		add_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = falconer # Revived hawking traditions
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_koko_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	887.9.17 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

### Children of Emperor Montoku (1000008883) with at least one date

1000008905 = {
	name = "Korehito" # Emperor Seiwa
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008883 # Emperor Montoku
	mother = 1000009630 # Fujiwara Akirakeiko
	trait = naive_appeaser # Powerless
	trait = content # Not rebellious!
	850.5.10 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_seiwa
		}
	}
	858.12.15 = { # Coronation
		name = "Seiwa"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_seiwa_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Takako/Takaiko, daughter of Fujiwara Nagara
	867.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009703 # Date unknown, but this ensures she's present in 867
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Fujiwara Tamiko, daughter of Fujiwara Yoshimi
	867.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009633 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Taira Kanshi
	# - Princess Kashi
	# - Minamoto Sadako
	# - Princess Ryushi
	# - Princess Kenshi
	# - Princess Tadako, daughter of Emperor Koko
	870.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000008953 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Fujiwara Yoriko, daughter of Fujiwara Mototsune
	871.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009716 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Fujiwara Kazuko, daughter of Fujiwara Mototsune
	873.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009717 # Date unknown, but they had a son in 874
	}
	# - Minamoto Takeko/Izuko, daughter of Minamoto Yoshiari
	877.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000010124 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Minamoto Seishi, daughter of Emperor Montoku
	876.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013446 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Minamoto Atsuko
	# - Minamoto Yoshiko, daughter of Minamoto Okimoto
	# - Ariwara Fumiko, daughter of Ariwara Yukihira
	874.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000012076 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Daughter of Fujiwara Yoshichika
	# - Daughter of Tachibana Yasukage
	867.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000014120 # Date unknown; works with son
	}
	# - Daughter of Fujiwara Nakamune
	869.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013542 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Daughter of Prince Munesada
	# - Daughter of Fujiwara Sadamune
	# - Daughter of Fujiwara Morofuji
	# - Daughter of Fujiwara Morokazu
	# - Daughter of Saeki Sanefusa
	# - Daughter of Oe Otondo
	# - Daughter of Kamo Mineo
	# - Daughter of Ono Takatori
	876.12.18 = { # Abdicates
		remove_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	878.1.1 = { # 878 or 879
		# Becomes a Buddhist monk or priest
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
		#name = "Soshin" # We want him to use his imperial name
	}
	881.1.7 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

### Children of Emperor Seiwa (1000008905)

1000008924 = {
	name = "Sadaakira" # Emperor Yozei
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008905 # Emperor Seiwa
	mother = 1000009703 # Fujiwara Takako
	trait = cruel
	trait = arbitrary
	trait = flamboyant_schemer # Caught murdering one of his retainers
	trait = possessed
	869.1.2 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_yozei
		}
	}
	# Married Princess Kanshi(n), daughter of Emperor Koko
	880.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000008954 # Date unknown; the Validator will complain, but it was presumably while he ruled
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Princess Yasuko, daughter of Emperor Koko
	872.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000008955 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Princesss Kyoko, daughter of Prince Koretada
	# - Daughter of Fujiwara Tonaga
	# - A woman from the Ki clan
	# - Daughter of Tomo Yasuhira
	# - A woman from the Saeki
	877.1.20 = { # Coronation
		name = "Yozei"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_yozei_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	884.3.4 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	949.10.23 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000008952 = {
	name = "Sadami" # Emperor Uda
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008885 # Emperor Koko
	mother = 1000008948 # Princesss Hanshi
	trait = ambitious # Sought to weaken the Fujiwara clan's power
	trait = just
	trait = charismatic_negotiator
	867.6.10 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_uda
		}
		# Unclear when he got the surname
		dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = got_surname
		}
	}
	887.1.1 = {
		# Reinstated
		dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = clr_surname
		}
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Yoshiko/Onshi, daughter of Fujiwara Mototsune
	888.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009720
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Fujiwara Taneko, daughter of Fujiwara Takafuji
	884.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009646 # Date unknown; they had a child in 885
	}
	# - Tachibana Yoshiko/Gishi, daughter of Tachibana Hiromi
	884.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000014121 # Date unknown; works with children
	}
	# - Sugawara Hiroko, daughter of Sugawara Michizane
	# - Minamoto Sadako, daughter of Minamoto Noburo
	# - Princess Norihime, daughter of Prince Toyo
	# - Fujiwara Yasuko, daughter of Fujiwara Arizane
	893.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013784 # Date unknown; had a daughter in 894
	}
	# - Minamoto Hisako
	# - Minamoto Shizuko
	# - Fujiwara Reiko/Hoshi, daughter of Fujiwara Tokihira
	919.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009723 # Date unknown, but they had a son in 920
	}
	# - "Lady Ise", daughter of Fujiwara Tsugukage
	891.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009772 # Date unknown
	}
	887.12.5 = { # Coronation
		name = "Uda"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_uda_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	891.2.25 = { # Death of Fujiwara Mototsune
		remove_trait = under_regency
	}
	897.8.4 = {
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	900.1.1 = {
		# Became a Buddhist priest; likely not a monk as he kept having children...
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		#name = "Kongo Kaku" # We want him to have the imperial name
		remove_consort = 1000009772 # Lady Ise
	}
	931.9.3 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

### Children of Emperor Uda (1000008952)

1000008977 = {
	name = "Kinshi"
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008952 # Emperor Uda
	mother = 1000009720 # Fujiwara Yoshiko
	890.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Married Prince Atsuyoshi
	910.4.7 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000008978 = {
	name = "Korezane" # Emperor Daigo
	dynasty = 1000027002 # Born Minamoto Korezane
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008952 # Emperor Uda
	mother = 1000009646 # Fujiwara Taneko
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = lustful # Had a lot of children
	trait = poet
	885.2.6 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_daigo
		}
	}
	887.1.1 = {
		dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
		name = "Atsuhito"
	}
	897.8.14 = {
		name = "Daigo"
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_daigo_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	909.1.1 = {
		add_trait = under_regency # Fujiwara Tokihira honored as regent
	}
	909.4.26 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Onshi, daughter of Fujiwara Mototsune
	901.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009718 # Date unknown
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Princess Ishi, daughter of Emperor Koko
	898.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000008956 # Date unknown, but they had a child in 899
	}
	# - Minamoto Washi, daughter of Emperor Koko
	902.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000008974 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Fujiwara Noshi, daughter of Fujiwara Sadakata
	930.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009653 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Fujiwara Wakako, daughter of Fujiwara Sadakuni
	910.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009649 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Minamoto Kaneko, daughter of Minamoto Motomi
	# - Fujiwara Senshi, daughter of Fujiwara Tsuranaga
	# - Daughter of Minamoto Noboru
	# - Minamoto Chikako, daughter of Minamoto Tonau
	903.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000010101 # Before 904
	}
	# - Princess Manshi, daughter of Prince Sukemi
	# - Fujiwara Yoshihime, daughter of Fujiwara Sugane
	910.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009380 # Date unclear, but they had a child in 911
	}
	# - Fujiwara Kuwako, daughter of Fujiwara Kanesuke
	923.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013737 # Date unknown; had a son in 923
	}
	# - Daughter of Fujiwara Korehira
	# - Daughter of Minamoto Toshimi
	930.10.16 = { # Abdicated
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	930.10.23 = {
		# Becomes a Buddhist monk and dies shortly thereafter
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000008981 = {
	name = "Yasuko" # Junshi
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008952 # Emperor Uda
	mother = 1000009646 # Fujiwara Taneko
	trait = child_of_consort
	892.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Saio of Ise 897-930
	897.3.1 = { # March
		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	930.1.1 = {
		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			remove_will_not_marry_effect = yes
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	959.2.12 = {
		death = yes # Or 958
	}
}

1000008997 = {
	name = "Yutaakira" # Emperor Suzaku
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008978 # Emperor Daigo
	mother = 1000009718 # Fujiwara Yasuko
	trait = content
	trait = chaste # Only had two consorts and one daughter, while other rulers around the same time had quite a few more...
	923.9.7 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_suzaku
		}
	}
	930.12.14 = { # Coronation
		name = "Suzaku"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_suzaku_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	# Married Princess Hiroko, daughter of Prince Yasuakira
	936.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009031 # Date unknown; this date means she'll be set as his wife in the IC start, which seems nice even if the Validator complains...
	}
	# Consort: Fujiwara Yoshiko, daughter of Fujiwara Saneyori
	950.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009743 # Date unknown; she died in 951
	}
	946.5.23 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	952.1.1 = {
		# Became a Buddhist monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	952.9.6 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

	name = "Nariakira" # Emperor Murakami

	culture = japanese

			set_character_flag = emperor_murakami

		add_consort = 1000009794 # Before 956

	951.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013740 # Date unknown

			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}

		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion

### Children of Emperor Murakami (1000008998)

1000009033 = {
	name = "Shoshi"

1000009034 = {
	name = "Norihira" # Emperor Reizei
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008998 # Emperor Murakami
	mother = 1000009808 # Fujiwara Yasuko
	trait = lunatic
	trait = humble
	trait = content
	950.6.12 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_rezei
		}
	}
	967.11.15 = { # Coronation
		name = "Reizei"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_reizei_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	# Married Princess Masako, daughter of Emperor Suzaku
	967.7.6 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009032 # After Reizei took the throne
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Fujiwara Chikako, daughter of Fujiwara Koretada
	963.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009820 # Before 964
	}
	# - Fujiwara Toko, daughter of Fujiwara Kaneie
	972.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009887 # Before 973
	}
	# - Fujiwara Yoshiko, daughter of Fujiwara Morosuke
	960.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013823 # Date unknown; they had no children
	}
	969.9.27 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	1011.11.21 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}

			set_character_flag = emperor_suzaku
		}

		add_spouse = 1000009072 # The Validator will complain, but it happened this year
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - "Fujiwara" Genshi, daughter of Prince Atsuyasu and adopted daughter of Fujiwara Yorimichi

		add_consort = 1000009961 # Before 1025

		add_consort = 1000009969

	1042.3.26 = {
		add_consort = 1000009980
	}

		name = "Suzaku"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_suzaku_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	1045.2.5 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency # Abdicates
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	1045.2.7 = {
		# Becomes a Buddhist monk and dies the same day
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009069 = {

	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family

	culture = japanese

	mother = 1000009800 # Fujiwara Sakoko

		birth = yes

	1012.1.1 = {
		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion

			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}

		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			remove_will_not_marry_effect = yes
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer

			add_lover = 1000009900 # Fujiwara Michimasa
		}
	}

		add_trait = bhikkhuni

			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion

		}

		effect = {

			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion

			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer

		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_horikawa
		}
	}
	1087.1.3 = {
		name = "Horikawa"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_horikawa_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	# Married Princess Atsuko, daughter of Emperor Go-Sanjo
	1093.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009086 # The Validator is unhappy, but she became Empress consort this year
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Fujiwara Satoko/Ishi, daughter of Fujiwara Sanesue
	1098.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009866
	}
	# - Princess Jinshi, daughter of Prince Yasusuke
	# - Fujiwara Muneko, daughter of Fujiwara Takamune
	# - Daughter of Fujiwara Tokitsune
	1107.8.9 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}

1000009101 = {
	name = "Munehito" # Emperor Toba
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009093 # Emperor Horikawa
	mother = 1000009866 # Fujiwara Satoko
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = naive_appeaser # Overshadowed by Emperor Shirakawa
	1103.2.24 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_toba
		}
	}
	1107.8.9 = {
		name = "Toba"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_toba_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Tamako, daughter of Fujiwara Kinzane
	1118.2.18 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009874 # The Validator complains, but this seems to be correct...
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Fujiwara Yasuko, daughter of Fujiwara Tadazane
	1113.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000010073 # A bit unclear as to the date
	}
	# - Fujiwara Nariko, daughter of Fujiwara Nagazane
	1134.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009520
		effect = {
			add_lover = 1000009520
			add_rival = 1000009874 # Fujiwara Tamako
		}
	}
	1142.1.1 = { # Nariko becomes Toba's wife after Tamako becomes a nun
		remove_spouse = 1000009874
		remove_consort = 1000009520
		add_spouse = 1000009520
	}
	# - Ki Ieko, daughter of Ki Mitsukiyo
	# - Sanjo-no-Tsubone, daughter of Fujiwara Iemasa
	# - Kasuga-no-Tsubone, daughter of Tokudaiji Saneyosi
	# - Fujitsubo (Nyogo), daughter of Tachibana Toshitsuna
	# - Tosa-no-Tsubone, daughter of Minamoto Mitsuyasu
	# - Daughter of Fujiwara Sanehira
	1123.2.25 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	1156.7.20 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009109 = {
	name = "Masahito" # Emperor Go-Shirakawa
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese

	father = 1000009101 # Emperor Toba
	mother = 1000009874 # Fujiwara Tamako

	trait = deceitful # Tricked the Taira into lowering their guard
	trait = quick
	trait = lustful # Had a lot of children
	trait = ambitious
	#trait = homosexual # Had a male lover, but also had a bunch of children; if only there was a bisexual trait...
	1127.10.18 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_shirakawa
		}
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Kinshi, daughter of Tokudaiji Kinyoshi
	# Consorts:
	# - Minamoto Yoshiko, daughter of Fujiwara Tsunesane and adotped daughter of Minamoto Arihito
	1139.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000010061 # The Validator will complain, but this appears to be correct
	}
	# - Taira Shigeko, daughter of Taira Tokinobu
	# - Sanjo (Fujiwara) Soko, daughter of Sanjo Kinnori
	# - Fujiwara Shigeko, daughter of Fujiwara Suenari
	1146.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013849 # Date unknown, but they had a daughter the next year
	}
	# - Bomon-no-Tsubone, daughter of Taira Nobushige
	# - Bomon-dono, daughter of Tokudaiji Kinyoshi
	# - Sanjo-no-Tsubone
	# - Tanba-no-Tsubone
	# - Uemonnosuke, daughter of Fujiwara Suketaka
	# - Omiya-no-Tsubone, daughter of Fujiwara Korezane
	# - Konoe-no-Tsubone, daughter of Fujiwara Kinyasu
	# - Miko no hime-gimi, daughter of Taira Kiyomori
	# - Takashina Eishi
	1155.8.22 = {
		name = "Shirakawa"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_shirakawa_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	1158.9.5 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency # Abdicates
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	1169.6.17 = {
		# Becomes a Buddhist priest/monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1192.4.26 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009122 = {
	name = "Morihito" # Emperor Nijo
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009109 # Emperor Go-Shirakawa
	mother = 1000010061 # Minamoto Yoshiko
	trait = child_of_consort
	1143.7.31 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_nijo
		}
	}
	1158.9.5 = {
		name = "Nijo"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_nijo_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	# Married Princess Yoshiko
	1159.3.12 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009114
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Fujiwara Muneko/Ikushi, daughter of Fujiwara Tadamichi
	1162.3.6 = {
		remove_spouse = 1000009114
		add_consort = 1000009114
		add_spouse = 1000010083
	}
	# - Fujiwara Masuko, daughter of Tokudaiji Kinyoshi
	# - Toku-no-Kimi, daughter of Minamoto Tadafusa
	# - Kasuga-dono, daughter of Nakahara Moromoto
	# - Umeryo-kimi, daughter of Minamoto Mitsunari
	# - Okura-daisuke
	# - Daughter of Minamoto Tadafusa (not Toku-no-Kimi)
	1165.8.3 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	1165.9.5 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

		# Got what was probably breast cancer at some point after leaving Kamo
		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "Reapers"
				}
				add_trait = cancer
			}
		}
	}
	# Friend of Fujiwara Shunzei and friend or lover of his son Teika
	1190.1.1 = {

	}

		birth = yes
	}

		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	1171.1.1 = {
		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			remove_will_not_marry_effect = yes
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}

		death = yes
	}

		}

1000009145 = {
	name = "Takahira" # Emperor Go-Toba, possibly named Takahari
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009123 # Emperor Takakura
	trait = intricate_webweaver # Schemed to regain the throne
	trait = poet
	trait = arbitrary # Ordered the death of two of his ladies-in-waiting for converting to Pure Land Buddhism
	trait = ambitious # Schemed to regain the throne
	trait = wroth # Ordered the death of two of his ladies-in-waiting for converting to Pure Land Buddhism
	1180.8.6 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_toba
		}
	}
	#1183.9.8 = { # Happens when Antoku dies; if you start during the Genpei War, the Taira might prevail...
	1185.4.25 = {
		name = "Toba"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_toba_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Takako/Kujo Ninshi, daughter of Kujo Kanezane
	1190.5.31 = {
		add_spouse = 1000012736 # Became Empress consort this date; the Validator doesn't like it, but...
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Minamoto Ariko, daughter of a priest named Noen and adoptive daughter of Minamoto Michitaka
	# - Fujiwara Shigeko, daughter of Takakura Norisue
	# - Bomon Tsubone, daughter of Bomon Nobukiyo
	# - Hyoe-no-kami no Tsubone, daughter of Minamoto Nobuyasu
	# - Owari no Tsubone, daughter of a priest named Kensei
	# - Omiya no Tsubone, daughter of Fujiwara Sadayoshi
	1206.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013870 # Date unknown; they had a son the next year
	}
	# - Shonagon no Suke
	# - Kamegiku, a shirabyoshi
	# - Taki, a shirabyoshi
	# - Tamba no Tsubone, a shirabyoshi
	# - Himehoshi, a shirabyoshi
	1198.2.18 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	1239.3.28 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

		add_consort = 1000009191 # Date unknown

	# - Nijo-no-Tsubone, daughter of Fujiwara Toshimori
	# - Ichijo-dono-no-tsubone, daughter of Fujiwara Kanefusa
	# - Dainagon-no-Tsubone, daughter of Nakanoin Michikata
	# - Daughter of Kujo Yoshihira
	# - Granddaughter of Minamoto Yorimasa
	# - "Fujiwara clan's descendant"
	#1242.2.21 = {
	1242.2.10 = {
		name = "Saga"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_saga_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	1246.2.16 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = retired_emperor

### Emperor Go-Horikawa and his children

1000009187 = {
	name = "Toyohito" # Emperor Go-Horikawa
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009144 # Prince Morisada
	# Unclear mother
	trait = amateurish_plotter
	1212.3.22 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_horikawa
		}
	}
	1221.7.29 = {
		name = "Horikawa"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_horikawa_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	# Married Sanjo/Fujiwara Ariko, daughter of Sanjo Kinfusa
	# Consorts:
	# - Konoe Nagako, daughter of Konoe Iezane
	1226.8.23 = { # The Validator is unhappy, but...
		add_spouse = 1000012708 # Became empress consort this date; might have been a consort previously
	}
	1229.5.12 = { # Demoted
		remove_spouse = 1000012708
		add_consort = 1000012708
	}
	# - Kujo Shunshi, daughter of Kujo Michiie
	1230.3.2 = {
		add_spouse = 1000012752 # Became empress consort this date; might have been a consort previously
	}
	# - Betto-Naishi, daughter of Jimyoin Ieyuki
	# - Dainagon-no-Tsubone, daughter of Fujiwara Kaneyoshi
	1232.11.17 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	1234.8.31 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009193 = {
	name = "Hisahito" # Emperor Go-Fukakusa

	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009166 # Emperor Go-Saga

	trait = ambitious

		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_fukakusa
		}
	}
	1246.2.16 = {
		name = "Fukakusa"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_fukakusa_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	1260.1.9 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = retired_emperor
		create_bloodline = {
			type = blood_of_emperor_go_fukakusa
		}
	}
	# Married Saionji/Fujiwara Kimiko, daughter of Saionji Saneuji
	# Consorts:
	# - Toin/Fujiwara Inshi, daughter of Toin Saneo
	# - Saionji/Fujiwara Aiko, daughter of Saionji Kinsuke
	# - Saionji/Fujiwara Moriko, daughter of Saionji Kintsune
	# - Sanjo/Fujiwara Fusako, daughter of Sanjo Kinchika
	# - Miyoshi Tadako, daughter of Miyoshi Yasuhira
	# - Betto-Naishi, daughter of Takakura Shigemichi
	# - "Lady Nijo", daughter of Minamoto Masatada
	1304.8.17 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009195 = {
	name = "Tsunehito" # Emperor Kameyama
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009166 # Emperor Go-Saga
	# Mother was Saionji Yoshiko
	trait = naive_appeaser # Wanted to compromise with Kublai Khan
	trait = lustful # Had many children
	trait = zealous
	trait = humble
	1249.7.9 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_kameyama
		}
	}
	1260.1.9 = {
		name = "Kameyama"
		add_trait = under_regency
		create_bloodline = {
			type = blood_of_emperor_kameyama
		}
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_kameyama_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	# Married Toin/Fujiwara Saneko, daughter of Toin Saneo
	# Consorts:
	# - Saionji/Fujiwara Kishi, daughter of Saionji Kinsuke
	# - Konoe/Fujiwara Ishi
	1275.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000012716 # Before 1276; the Validator will be unhappy
	}
	# - Saionji/Fujiwara Eiko, daughter of Saionji Sanekane
	# - Daughter of Koga/Minamoto Michiyoshi
	# - Daughter of Sanjo Sanehira
	# - Daughter of Fujiwara Saneto
	# - Fujiwara Masako, daughter of Hosshoji Masahira
	# - Sochi-Naishi, daughter of Taira Tokinaka
	# - Toin/Fujiwara Miwako, daughter of Toin Saneo
	# - Nukigawa, an ex-priestess from the Kyogoku temple
	# - Daughter of a priest named Genkoma
	# - Fujiwara Hisako, daughter of Fujiwara Kagefusa
	# - Daughter of Sanjo Kinchika
	# - Daughter of Ogura Kino
	1274.3.6 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	1289.1.1 = {
		# Became a Buddhist priest/monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1305.10.4 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009216 = {
	name = "Hirohito" # Emperor Fushimi
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009193 # Emperor Go-Fukakusa

	trait = ambitious
	trait = flamboyant_schemer
	1265.5.10 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_fushimi
		}
	}
	# Married Saionji/Fujiwara Shoshi, daughter of Saionji Sanekane
	# Consorts:
	# - Toin/Fujiwara Sueko, daughter of Toin Saneo
	# - Itsutsuji/Fujiwara Tsuneko, daughter of Itsutsuji Tsuneuji
	# - Toin/Fujiwara Eiko, daughter of Toin Kinmune
	# - Ogimachi Moriko, daughter of Ogimachi Michiakira
	# - Gondainagon-no-Tsubone, daughter of Nakanoin Tomouji
	# - Miyoshi Hirako, daughter of Miyoshi Toshihira
	# - Daughter of Fujiwara Shigemichi
	# - Kasuga-no-Tsubone
	# - Nishi-no-Kata
	1287.11.27 = {
		name = "Fushimi"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_fushimi_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	1298.8.30 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	1313.1.1 = {
		# Became a Buddhist monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1317.10.8 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}

			set_character_flag = emperor_uda_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}

	1285.9.19 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009214 # The Validator is unhappy, but this seems to be correct...
	}
	1287.11.27 = {
		remove_trait = under_regency
		add_trait = retired_emperor
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Horikawa/Minamoto Motoko, daughter of Horikawa Tomomori
	# - Itsutsuji/Fujiwara Chushi, daughter of Itsutsuji Tadatsugu
	# - Princess Mizuko, daughter of Prince Munetaka

		add_consort = 1000009202 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Ichijo-no-Tsubone, daughter of Hashimoto Sanetoshi
	# - Princess Rinshi, daughter of Prince Munetaka

1000009241 = {
	name = "Kuniharu" # Emperor Go-Nijo
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009231 # Emperor Go-Uda
	# Mother was Horikawa/Minamoto Motoko
	trait = child_of_consort
	1285.3.9 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_nijo
		}
	}
	1301.3.2 = {
		name = "Nijo"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_nijo_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Kinshi, daughter of Tokudaiji Kintaka
	# Consorts:
	# - Fujiwara Tamako, daughter of Ichijo Sanetsune
	1303.3.5 = {
		add_consort = 1000012775
	}
	# - Fujiwara Muneko, daughter of Itsutsuji Munechika
	# - Koto Naishi, daughter of Taira Munetoshi
	# - Dainagon-no-Tsubone, daughter of Sanjo Kinyasu
	# - "Lady Mikushige", daughter of Sanjo Kinchika
	# - Daughter of Taira Nobusuke
	# - Shindainagon-no-Tsubone
	1308.9.10 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009242 = {
	name = "Masako" # Shoshi
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009231 # Emperor Go-Uda
	# Mother was Itsutsuji/Fujiwara Chushi
	trait = child_of_consort
	1286.9.28 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Saio of Ise 1306-1308
	1306.1.1 = {
		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	1308.1.1 = {
		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			remove_will_not_marry_effect = yes
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	# Honorary Empress of Emperor Go-Daigo
	1319.9.21 = {
		# Became a Buddhist nun after she stopped being Honorary Empress
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhuni
	}
	1348.11.23 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009243 = {
	name = "Takaharu" # Emperor Go-Daigo
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009231 # Emperor Go-Uda
	# Mother was Itsutsuji/Fujiwara Chushi
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = ambitious # Successfully overthrew the Kamakura Shogunate
	trait = flamboyant_schemer # His plans got discovered in 1324
	trait = trusting # His plans were betrayed in 1331
	trait = just # Sought to reform the legal system
	trait = proud # Wanted to become an absolute ruler
	trait = lustful # Had a ton of children
	trait = hedonist
	trait = deceitful # Managed to sneak away with the Imperial Regalia
	1288.11.26 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_daigo
		}
	}
	1318.3.29 = {
		name = "Daigo"
		add_trait = under_regency
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = emperor_daigo_used # If deposed, don't reuse the name!
		}
	}
	# Claims on the Northern court; both dates necessary
	1331.10.22 = {
		effect = {
			c_yamashiro = {
				add_claim = PREV
			}
		}
	}
	1333.6.29 = { # End of the Regency
		remove_trait = under_regency
	}
	1336.9.20 = {
		effect = {
			c_yamashiro = {
				add_claim = PREV
			}
			e_japan = {
				add_claim = PREV # Ashikaga Takauji takes over this date
			}
		}
	}
	# Married Saionji Kishi, daughter of Saionji Sanekane
	# Married Princess Junshi, daughter of Emperor Go-Fushimi
	1334.1.13 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009255
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Fujiwara Eishi, daughter of Nijo Michihira
	1333.12.28 = {
		add_consort = 1000012795
	}
	# - Fujiwara Chikako, daughter of Itsutsuji Munechika
	# - Dainagon'nosuke, daughter of Kitabatake Moroshige
	# - Shin-Ansatsu-tenji, daughter of Jimyoin Yasufuji
	# - Sochi-no-suke
	# - Koto no Naishi, daughter of Saionji Tsunafusa
	# - Shosho no Naishi, daughter of Sugawara Arinaka
	# - Fujiwara/Ano Renshi, daughter of Ano Kinkado
	# - Minamoto Chikako, daughter of Kitabatake Morochika
	# - Fujiwara Tameko, daughter of Nijo Tameyo
	# - Fujiwara Jisshi, daughter of Toin Saneo
	# - Fujiwara Moriko, daughter of Toin Saneyasu
	# - Princess Kenshi, daughter of Emperor Kameyama
	1322.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009289 # Date unknown; they had a son in 1323
	}
	# - Fujiwara/Nijo Michiko, daughter of Nijo Tamemichi
	# - Ichijo no Tsubone, daughter of Saionji Sanetoshi
	# - Shonagon no Naishi, daughter of Shijo Takasuke
	# - Dainagon-no-Tsubone, daughter of Ogimachi Saneakira
	# - Saemon-no-kami-no-tsubone, daughter of Nijo Tametada
	# - Gon-no-Chunagon no Tsubone, daughter of Sanjo Kinyasu
	# - Daughter of Yoshida Sadafusa
	# - Bomon-no-Tsubone, daughter of Bomon Kiyotada
	# - Daughter of Horikawa Mototomo
	# - Minamoto Yasuko, daughter of Minamoto Yasutoki
	# - Wakamizu-no-Tsubone, daughter of Minamoto Yasutoki
	# - Daughter of Horiguchi Sadayoshi
	# - Konoe no Tsubone
	1339.9.19 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

### Children of Emperor Go-Daigo (1000009243) with dates

1000009277 = {
	name = "Yoshiko" # Kanshi
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009243 # Emperor Go-Daigo
	# Mother was Saionji Kishi
	1315.11.13 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Saio of Ise 1330-1331
	1330.1.1 = {
		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	1331.1.1 = {
		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			remove_will_not_marry_effect = yes
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	# Married Emperor Kogon
	1362.5.30 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

### Descendants of Fujiwara Sadao (1000009342)

1000009343 = {
	name = "Yasunori"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009342 # Fujiwara Sadao
	mother = 1000014165 # Daughter of Abe Otomasa
	trait = kind
	trait = fortune_builder
	trait = just
	trait = zealous # Supposedly died chanting the nembutsu

### Children of Fujiwara Nagazane (1000009517)

1000009520 = {
	name = "Nariko" # Bifukumon'in
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009517 # Fujiwara Nagazane
	mother = 1000010338 # Minamoto Masako
	trait = ambitious # Sought to put her daughter on the Chrysanthemum Throne
	trait = elusive_shadow # Gathered power around her
	trait = proud # Wanted to be buried at Mount Koya despite it being closed to women
	trait = zealous
	1117.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Married Emperor Toba
	1134.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			add_lover = 1000009101 # Emperor Toba
			add_rival = 1000009874 # Fujiwara Tamako
		}
	}
	1156.1.1 = {
		# Becomes a Buddhist nun
		add_trait = bhikkhuni
	}
	1160.12.22 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009521 = {
	name = "Akimori"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009517 # Fujiwara Nagazane
	# Unclear mother

	1100.1.1 = {

### Children of Fujiwara Fuyutsugu (1000009578)

	}

	}

1000009623 = {
	name = "Yoshifusa"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009578 # Fujiwara Fuyutsugu
	mother = 1000009391 # Fujiwara Mitsuko
	trait = ambitious
	trait = grey_eminence
	trait = deceitful
	trait = proud
	trait = celibate # Only had one child, and never bothered to remarry, so he should ideally not get children in AI hands...
	trait = just
	804.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Married Minamoto Kiyohime, daughter of Emperor Saga
	823.1.1 = { # Exact date unknown, but it was this year even though the Validator will be unhappy...
		add_spouse = 1000008869
	}
	858.10.7 = {
		create_bloodline = {
			type = fujiwara_bloodline
		}
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	872.10.7 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009642 = { # Murasaki Shikibu
	name = "Kaoruko" # Personal name unclear, but this is a suspected name (Takako is another)
	female = yes

	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009640 # Fujiwara Tametoki
	# Mother was the daughter of Fujiwara Tamanobu
	trait = poet
	trait = scholar
	trait = mastermind_theologian
	trait = diligent
	trait = genius
	trait = proud # Seen as haughty
	trait = shy # Withdrawn
	trait = deceitful # Taught Empress Shoshi Chinese in secret
	975.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Between 970 and 978
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Nobutaka in 998 and gave birth to Daini no Sanmi (Fujiwara Katako/Kenshi) in 999
	# Rival of Izumi Shikibu
	1004.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			add_rival = 1000010631 # Sei Shonagon
		}
		give_nickname = nick_nihongi_no_tsubone # The Lady of the Chronicles; given in scorn, adopted in pride (possibly)
	}
	# Not interested in Fujiwara Michinaga, despite his interest in her
	1031.1.1 = {
		death = yes # 1014 or 1031
	}
}

	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009666 # Fujiwara Akitaka
	mother = 1000013654 # Fujiwara Etsuko
	1094.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	1123.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013903 # Fujiwara Tadako, daughter of Fujiwara Toshitada; date unknown, but they had a son the next year
	}
	1148.1.1 = { # Becomes a monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1148.1.27 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

# And back to Fujiwara Nagara's children

1000009699 = {
	name = "Mototsune"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009622 # Fujiwara Nagara
	mother = 1000009698 # Fujiwara Otoharu
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = ambitious
	trait = grey_eminence
	836.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	872.10.11 = {
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		create_bloodline = {
			type = fujiwara_bloodline # It is worth giving him this despite the fact that the bloodline technically should die with Yoshifusa
		}
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	# Married the daughter of Prince Saneyasu
	891.2.25 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009708 = {
	name = "Sumitomo"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009706 # Fujiwara Yoshinori
	# Unclear mother
	trait = ambitious # Rebelled
	trait = tough_soldier # Didn't last long
	trait = pirate # Became the leader of some pirates plaguing the Inland Sea
	893.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Approx.
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = is_fujiwara_sumitomo
			add_trait = pirate
		}
	}
	936.1.1 = {
		culture = wako # Lets him raid coasts
		effect = {
			c_harima = {
				add_claim = PREV # Invaded Harima
			}
			c_bizen = {
				add_claim = PREV # ... and Bizen
			}
			add_friend = 1000010483 # Taira Masakado
		}
	}
	# Ancestor of the Arima clan
	941.7.21 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_execution
			# Killed by Tachibana Toyasu
		}
	}
}

	name = "Tadahira"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009699 # Fujiwara Mototsune
	# Mother was the daughter of Prince Saneyasu

	trait = quick
	880.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Married Minamoto Junshi, daughter of Emperor Uda
	899.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000008986 # Date unknown, but their son was born in 900
	}
	# Consort: Minamoto Shoshi, daughter of Minamoto Yoshiari
	908.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013930 # Date unknown; had a son the next year
	}
	930.10.16 = {
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent

1000009732 = {
	name = "Morosuke"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009715 # Fujiwara Tadahira
	mother = 1000013930 # Minamoto Akiko/Shoshi
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = charismatic_negotiator
	trait = honest
	trait = just
	trait = lustful # Had affairs with several princesses
	trait = scholar
	trait = poet
	909.1.11 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Moriko
	923.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009404 # Date unknown, but works with their son; the Validator isn't happy
	}
	930.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013801 # Daughter of Fujiwara Akitada; date unknown, but works with son
		effect = {
			add_lover = 1000009014 # Princess Kinshi, daughter of Emperor Daigo
			add_friend = 1000009018 # Minamoto Takaakira
		}
	}
	# Married Princess Kinshi "later"; it'll be most interesting if things are set up properly in the IC start
	931.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009014 # He had other wives prior to her, so she's set as his consort; date of marriage unknown
	}
	# Had affairs with Princesses Masako/Gashi and Yasuko/Koushi prior to marrying them; it is most interesting with this set up in the IC start
	936.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			add_lover = 1000009016 # Princess Masako/Gashi, daughter of Emperor Daigo
			add_lover = 1000008996 # Princess Yasuko/Koushi, daughter of Emperor Daigo
		}
	}
	# Married Princess Masako/Gashi, daughter of Emperor Daigo
	938.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009016 # After Kinshi's death in 938, before 939
	}
	# Married Princess Yasuko/Koushi, daughter of Emperor Daigo
	954.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000008996 # After Masako/Gashi's death in 954, before 955
	}
	960.5.29 = {
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu # Technically not...
	}
	960.5.31 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009741 # Fujiwara Tadatoshi
	mother = 1000013811 # Daughter of Fujiwara Masamune
	trait = mastermind_theologian # Had a thorough knowledge of customs and rites
	trait = mystic # Summoned exorcists and did other strange things
	trait = lustful # Amorous
	957.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Married to a daughter of Minamoto Koremasa
	984.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013933 # Date unknown; they had a daughter in 985
	}
	# Consort: Princess Enshi, daughter of Prince Tamehira (after Emperor Kazan became a priest)
	986.8.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000010325
	}
	1046.2.26 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

### Children of Fujiwara Morosuke (1000009732)

1000009804 = {
	name = "Koretada"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009732 # Fujiwara Morosuke
	mother = 1000009404 # Fujiwara Moriko
	trait = poet
	trait = flamboyant_schemer
	trait = attractive
	trait = quick
	trait = proud
	924.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # The Validator doesn't like this
	}
	944.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013983 # Princess Keiko; they had a daughter the next year
	}
	970.6.24 = {
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	972.12.9 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009805 = {
	name = "Kanemichi"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009732 # Fujiwara Morosuke
	mother = 1000009404 # Fujiwara Moriko
	trait = attractive
	trait = gluttonous
	trait = naive_appeaser

		birth = yes
		# Ancestor of the Honda clan
	}
	946.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013998 # Princess Akiko, daughter of Prince Ariakira
	}

		add_consort = 1000013739 # Daughter of Fujiwara Aritoshi; date unknown, but they hada son in 957
	}
	972.12.9 = {
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent

				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan

		}

	977.12.20 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009806 = {
	name = "Kaneie"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009732 # Fujiwara Morosuke
	mother = 1000009404 # Fujiwara Moriko
	trait = ambitious
	trait = intricate_webweaver
	929.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}

	}
	959.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013938 # Daughter of Minamoto Kanetada; date unknown; adopted daughter born the next year
	}
	972.12.9 = {
		effect = {
			add_rival = 1000009805 # Fujiwara Kanemichi
		}
		add_consort = 1000009749 # Princess Yasuko; date unknown
	}
	973.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013795 # Daughter of Fujiwara Kuninori; date unknown, but works with daughter
	}
	986.7.31 = {
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	990.5.5 = {
		remove_trait = japanese_regent # Resigned
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
		# Becames seriously ill
		add_trait = ill
	}
	990.5.8 = {
		# Became a Buddhist monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	990.7.26 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

### Children of Fujiwara Kaneie (1000009806)

1000009884 = {
	name = "Michitaka"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009806 # Fujiwara Kaneie
	mother = 1000009504 # Fujiwara Tokihime
	trait = drunkard
	trait = kind
	trait = amateurish_plotter
	953.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	972.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000014123 # Tachibana Kiyoko; date unknown, but works with scripted date for son
	}
	973.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000012119 # Takashina Takako; date unknown
	}
	# TIANXIATODO: 1000013795 as consort, once her daughter is added
	990.5.5 = {
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	995.5.5 = { # Retires seven days before his death
		remove_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	995.5.8 = {
		# Becomes a monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	995.5.12 = { # Or the 16th
		death = yes
	}
}

	name = "Michikane"

	}
	980.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013824 # Fujiwara Shigeko, daughter of Fujiwara Morosuke; date unknown, but they had a daughter in 984
	}
	983.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013832 # Daughter of Fujiwara Tokazu; date unknown, but they had a child before 985
	}
	995.6.6 = {
		add_trait = japanese_regent # For all of seven days
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	995.6.13 = {
		give_nickname = nick_nanoka_no_kampaku
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009886 = {
	name = "Michinaga"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009806 # Fujiwara Kaneie
	mother = 1000009504 # Fujiwara Tokihime
	trait = grey_eminence # The Fujiwara clan reached the zenith of its powers under him
	trait = genius
	trait = ambitious
	trait = brave
	trait = hunter # Skilled archer
	trait = cavalry_leader # Skilled horseman
	trait = poet
	trait = charitable # Held extravagant parties, spent money on temples, etc.
	trait = temperate # Exercised self-control
	trait = zealous # Spent a lot of money on shrines and temples, and supported Amidist Pure Land Buddhism
	966.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	987.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000010264 # Minamoto Michiko/Rinshi; date unclear
	}
	992.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000010310 # Minamoto Akiko/Meishi; date unclear
	}
	995.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009854 # Fujiwara Takeko/Genshi; date unknown
	}
	1013.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013989 # Daughter of Minamoto Shigemitsu; date unknown, but they had a son the next year
	}
	1016.3.24 = { # Using Go-Ichijo's coronation date
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	1017.4.15 = { # Steps down, but remains the true power in Japan
		remove_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1019.4.28 = {
		# Becomes a monk
		add_trait = bhikkhu
		#name = "Gyokan" # Let's use his birth name!
	}
	1028.1.3 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000009957 = {
	name = "Yorimichi"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = buddhist # Founded a Buddhist temple, so this would seem to make sense
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009886 # Fujiwara Michinaga
	mother = 1000010264 # Minamoto Michiko
	trait = poet
	trait = charismatic_negotiator
	trait = proud # Issued an edict naming himself Ichi no Hito (First Subject)
	992.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	1009.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000009301 # Princess Takahime; the Validator is unhappy
	}
	1023.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000014014 # Daughter of Minamoto Norisada
	}
	1017.4.15 = {
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			set_character_flag = ichi_no_hito
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
		give_nickname = nick_ichi_no_hito
	}
	1068.1.12 = {
		remove_trait = japanese_regent # Resigned
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1072.4.29 = {
		# Became a Buddhist monk
		add_trait = bhikkhu
		#name = "Rengekaku" # It's better to use his birth name...
	}
	1074.3.2 = {
		death = yes
		#name = "Jakukaku" # It's better to use his birth name...
	}
}

	mother = 1000010264 # Minamoto Michiko
