	1007.1.26 = {
		birth = yes
	}

		add_trait = measles # Got it around when Go-Reizei was born
	}
	1025.8.30 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_trait
		}
	}
}

# Added Senshi

1000009976 = {
	name = "Senshi"
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009042 # Prince Tomohira
	mother = 1000014013 # Daughter of Prince Tamehira
	1005.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Saio of Ise 1016-1036
	1016.1.1 = {
		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	1036.1.1 = {
		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			remove_will_not_marry_effect = yes
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	1081.7.24 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000010039 = {
	name = "Morozane"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009957 # Fujiwara Yorimichi
	# Mother was Fujiwara Masako/Gishi, daughter of Fujiwara Yorinari
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = poet
	trait = amateurish_plotter # Lost much of the Regent's power to Shirakawa
	1042.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = is_fujiwara_morozane
		}
	}
	1061.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013947 # Daughter of Minamoto Yorikuni; date unknown, but they had a son the next year
	}
	1066.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013896 # Daughter of Fujiwara Motosada; might as well have her here in 1066...
	}
	1075.11.6 = {
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	1094.3.8 = {
		remove_trait = japanese_regent # Resigns
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1101.2.28 = {
		# Becomes a Buddhist monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1101.3.14 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

### Children of Fujiwara Morozane (1000010039)

1000010042 = {
	name = "Moromichi"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010039 # Fujiwara Morozane
	# Mother was Minamoto Reishi, daughter of Minamoto Morofusa
	trait = just
	trait = kind
	trait = underhanded_rogue
	trait = scholar
	trait = brave
	trait = zealous # Opposed Buddhist monks, so let's not have him converting
	1062.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Matako, daughter of Fujiwara Toshiie
	1076.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013880 # The Validator will complain, but this is the correct year
	}
	1087.1.3 = {
		effect = {
			add_rival = 1000009083 # Emperor Shirakawa
		}
	}
	1092.1.1 = {
		remove_spouse = 1000013880 # Divorced in or before 1092
	}
	1094.3.8 = {
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	1097.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013948 # Daughter of Minamoto Yoritsuna; date unknown, but they had an unclear daughter the next year

		death = yes
	}

	culture = japanese

		birth = yes
	}

		add_consort = 1000014021 # Minamoto Moroko; they had a son the next year
	}
	1099.7.18 = {
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	1121.1.22 = {
		remove_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1140.10.2 = {
		# Became a Buddhist monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1162.7.31 = {
		death = yes
	}

	culture = japanese

		birth = yes

1000010080 = {
	name = "Motozane"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010074 # Fujiwara Tadamichi
	mother = 1000014030 # Minamoto Nobuko
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = naive_appeaser
	1143.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	1158.8.11 = {
		dynasty = 1100017293 # Konoe; date a bit unclear
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	# Married a daughter of Fujiwara Tadataka; divorced after 1160
	1159.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013864 # Date unknown; they had a son the next year
	}
	1161.1.1 = { # After 1160; there's not a single date the Validator will like...
		remove_spouse = 1000013864 # The above
		add_spouse = 1000010440	# Taira Moriko, daughter of Taira Kiyomori
	}
	1162.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013691 # Daughter of Fujiwara Akisuke; works with children
	}
	# Married a daughter of Minamoto Moritsune
	1165.6.25 = {
		remove_trait = japanese_regent # Resigned
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1166.8.23 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

#### Seiwa Genji

### Minamoto Tsunemoto and his children

1000010132 = {
	name = "Tsunemoto"
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008934 # Prince Sadasumi
	# Mother was Minamoto Harako, daughter of Minamoto Yoshiari
	trait = skilled_tactician # Took part in several imperial campaigns
	894.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	961.1.1 = {
		# Granted the Minamoto surname the year he died
		dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = got_surname
		}
	}
	961.12.25 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000010133 = {
	name = "Mitsunaka"
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010132 # Minamoto Tsunemoto
	# Mother was either the daughter of Tachibana Shigefuru or the daughter of Fujiwara Toshinari
	trait = poet
	trait = ambitious
	trait = intricate_webweaver
	912.4.29 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	947.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013922 # Daughter of Minamoto Suguru; date unknown, but they had a son the next year
	}
	961.1.1 = {
		# Presumably at the same time as his father
		dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = got_surname
		}
	}
	967.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013540 # Daughter of Fujiwara no Munetada
	}
	987.1.1 = {
		# Became a Buddhist monk
		religion = buddhist # Likely before this point and after 977
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
		#name = "Mankei" # Better to use his birth name
	}
	997.10.6 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000010134 = {
	name = "Mitsumasa"
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010132 # Minamoto Tsunemoto
	# Mother was either the daughter of Tachibana Shigefuru or the daughter of Fujiwara Toshinari
	913.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Unknown
	}
	961.1.1 = {
		# Presumably at the same time as his father
		dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = got_surname
		}
	}
	1005.1.1 = {
		death = yes # After 1004
	}

### Children of Minamoto Mitsunaka (1000010133)

1000010136 = { # Raiko
	name = "Yorimitsu"
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010133 # Minamoto Mitsunaka
	mother = 1000013922 # Daughter of Minamoto Suguru
	trait = wroth # Was willing to take violent measures that the Fujiwaras couldn't/wouldn't
	trait = skilled_tactician
	trait = content
	trait = poet
	948.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	953.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			add_friend = 1000013927 # Watanabe Tsuna
		}
	}
	954.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			add_friend = 1000010497 # Taira Tadamichi, a.k.a. Usui Sadamitsu
		}
	}
	961.1.1 = {
		# Presumably at the same time as his grandfather
		dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = got_surname
		}
	}
	1002.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			add_friend = 1000012143 # Oe Masahira
		}
	}
	1021.8.29 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

### Children of Minamoto Nakamasa (1000010152)

1000010155 = {
	name = "Yorimasa"
	dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010152 # Minamoto Nakamasa
	# Mother was the daughter of Fujiwara Tomomi
	trait = tough_soldier # Led the Minamoto forces early in the Genpei War
	trait = poet
	trait = content # Tried to stay out of politics
	1104.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Or 1106
	}
	1118.2.10 = {
		effect = {
			add_friend = 1000010428 # Taira Kiyomori
		}
	}
	1179.11.28 = {
		# Became a Buddhist monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
		effect = {
			remove_friend = 1000010428 # Taira Kiyomori
		}
	}
	1180.6.20 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_suicide # Committed Seppuku following the Battle of Uji
		}
	}
}

	name = "Yoshiie" # Hachimantaro
	dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010182 # Minamoto Yoriyoshi

			set_character_flag = is_hachimantaro

		}

			add_rival = 1000010215 # Minamoto Yoshitsune
		}

	# Kamakura Shogun 1192.8.21 - 1199.2.7

		create_bloodline = {
			type = kamakura_shogunate_bloodline
		}
	}
	1193.9.14 = {
		add_trait = kinslayer # Had his brother executed

		add_trait = bhikkhu

1000010215 = {
	name = "Yoshitsune"
	dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese

	trait = japanese_feudal_trait
	trait = trusting

		birth = yes
	}
	1184.2.21 = {
		add_trait = familial_kinslayer # Killed his cousin Minamoto Yoshinaka
	}
	# Possibly had unclear children
	1185.8.16 = { # Formally put in charge of Iyo, but his brother Yoritomo prevented it
		effect = {
			c_iyo = {
				add_claim = ROOT
			}
			c_uma = {
				add_claim = ROOT
			}
			c_uwa = {
				add_claim = ROOT
			}
			add_rival = 1000010210 # Minamoto Yoritomo
		}
		employer = 1000009559 # Fujiwara Hidehira
	}
	1189.6.15 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_suicide # At the orders of Fujiwara Yasuhira
		}
		# According to Ainu sorces he escaped and fled to Hokkaido, which Japanese sources disagree with
		# There's also a discredited theory that he fled to the mainland and became Genghis Khan
	}
}

1000010230 = {
	name = "Nakaie"
	dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010196 # Minamoto Yoshikata
	# Mother was from the Fujiwara clan
	trait = japanese_feudal_trait
	1145.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Unknown
	}
	1180.6.20 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_execution # Executed by the forces of Taira Tomomori and Taira Shigehira shortly after the Battle of Uji, June 20, 1180
			killer = 1000010439 # Taira Shigehira
		}
	}
}

1000010231 = {
	name = "Yoshinaka"
	dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010196 # Minamoto Yoshikata
	# Mother was from the Fujiwara clan
	trait = tough_soldier
	trait = deceitful
	trait = ambitious
	trait = japanese_feudal_trait
	1154.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Technically changed his surname to Kiso, but he's famously known as a Minamoto, so...
	1184.1.3 = {
		add_trait = dynastic_kinslayer
	}
	1184.2.21 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_battle
			killer = 1000010215 # Minamoto Yoshitsune
		}
	}
}

		birth = yes

		add_spouse = 1000010220 # Minamoto Ohime; both were quite young
	}
	1184.6.4 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_execution # By Tonai Mitsuzumi, at Minamoto Yoritomo's orders
		}
	}
}

		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist

#### Uda Genji

### Children of Prince Atsumi (1000008982)

1000010258 = {
	name = "Masanobu" # Or Masazane
	dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto; unclear when he got the surname
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008982 # Prince Atsumi
	mother = 1000013799 # Daughter of Fujiwara Tokihira
	920.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	950.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000009654 # Fujiwara Atsuko/Bokushi; date unknown
	}
	993.6.1 = { # June
		add_trait = ill
	}
	993.8.18 = {
		# Becoems a monk the day before he dies
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	993.8.19 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000010259 = {
	name = "Shigenobu"
	dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto; unclear when he got the surname
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008982 # Prince Atsumi
	mother = 1000013799 # Daughter of Fujiwara Tokihira
	922.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	950.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013748 # Daughter of Fujiwara Asatada; date unknown, but they had a son the next year
	}
	967.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000014004 # Daughter of Minamoto Takaakira; date unknown, but they had a son the next year
	}
	985.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013808 # Daughter of Fujiwara Yoritada; date unknown; had a daughter that had a child in 1006
	}
	995.6.8 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

### Minamoto Hiromasa, son of Prince Yoshiakira (1000009007)

	name = "Hiromasa"
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese

	trait = scholar
	trait = slothful
	trait = indulgent_wastrel
	918.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # The Validator is unhappy with this...
	}
	933.1.1 = {
		dynasty = 1000027002 # Minamoto; before 934
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = got_surname
		}
	}

		death = yes
	}

	name = "Kyoshi"
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family

		birth = yes
	}
	# Saio of Ise 986-1010
	986.1.1 = {
		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	1010.1.1 = {
		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			remove_will_not_marry_effect = yes
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	1011.5.26 = {
		death = yes # At the earliest
	}
}

1000010385 = {
	name = "Yoshiko" # Kashi
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009066 # Prince Atsuakira
	# Mother was the daughter(?) of Minamoto Nagatsune
	trait = child_of_consort
	1030.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Approx.
	}
	# Saio of Ise 1046-1051
	1046.3.10 = {
		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	1051.2.21 = { # Stops being Saio due to her father's death
		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			remove_will_not_marry_effect = yes
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	1067.1.1 = {
		death = yes # Unknown; after 1051
	}
}

	}
	889.5.13 = {
		dynasty = 1000027003 # Taira
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = got_surname
		}
	}
	904.1.1 = {
		death = yes # At the earliest
	}
}

		birth = yes
	}

		dynasty = 1000027003 # Taira; presumably alongside his father
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = got_surname
		}
	}

		death = {
			death_reason = death_battle

		}
	}

### Children of Taira Tadamori (1000010427)

1000010428 = {
	name = "Kiyomori"
	dynasty = 1000027003 # Taira
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010427 # Taira Tadamori
	# Mother was Gion no Nyogo - mistress of Emperor Shirakawa
	trait = japanese_feudal_trait
	trait = intricate_webweaver
	trait = ambitious
	trait = trusting # Spared some of Minamoto Yoshitomo's sons, and we know how *that* turned out...
	trait = kind
	trait = deceitful
	trait = proud
	1118.2.10 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			add_friend = 1000010155 # Minamoto Yorimasa
		}
	}
	1156.8.15 = {
		add_trait = familial_kinslayer # Executed his uncle
	}
	1156.8.17 = {
		effect = {
			add_rival = 1000010195 # Minamoto Yoshitomo
		}
	}
	1167.3.7 = { # Becomes Daijo-Daijin; is the first samurai appointed to this position
		create_bloodline = {
			type = taira_bloodline
		}
	}
	1168.3.7 = { # Retires and becomes a monk one year after he became Daijo-Daijin
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1170.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			add_rival = 1000010081 # Fujiwara/Matsudono Motofusa
		}
	}
	1179.11.28 = {
		effect = {
			remove_friend = 1000010155 # Minamoto Yorimasa
		}
	}
	1181.3.20 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000010429 = {
	name = "Iemori"
	dynasty = 1000027003 # Taira
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010427 # Taira Tadamori
	# Mother was Fujiwara Muneko/Ike no Zenni
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = japanese_feudal_trait
	1123.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Or 1127
	}
	1149.4.24 = {
		add_trait = ill
		death = {
			death_reason = death_trait
		}
	}
}

1000010430 = {
	name = "Tsunemori"
	dynasty = 1000027003 # Taira

### Children of Taira Yoshimasa (1000010416)

1000010483 = {
	name = "Masakado"
	dynasty = 1000027003 # Taira
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010416 # Taira Yoshimasa
	# Unclear mother

	trait = skilled_tactician

	trait = proud
	900.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Unknown
	}
	935.2.1 = {
		add_trait = familial_kinslayer
	}
	936.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			add_friend = 1000009708 # Fujiwara Sumitomo
			# Waged war for these
			c_hitachi = {
				add_claim = PREV
			}
			c_shimotsuke = {
				add_claim = PREV
			}
			c_kozuke = {
				add_claim = PREV
			}
			# Sought to take over the Kanto region
			c_bonshu = {
				add_claim = PREV
			}
			c_sagami = {
				add_claim = PREV
			}
			c_kazusa = {
				add_claim = PREV
			}
			# Claimed to be the emperor
			e_japan = {
				add_claim = PREV
			}
			#k_chrysanthemum_throne = {
			#	add_claim = PREV
			#}
		}
	}
	940.3.25 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_execution
			killer = 1000010419 # Taira Sadamori (alternatively Fujiwara Hidesato)
		}
	}
}

		birth = yes # Unknown; had a child in 944
	}
	# In charge of Mimasaka at some point
	992.1.1 = {
		death = yes # At the earliest
	}
}

### Taira Chikanobu, son of Taira Masaki (1000010507), and his children

1000010511 = {
	name = "Chikanobu"
	dynasty = 1000027003 # Taira
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010507 # Taira Masaki
	# Unclear mother
	946.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# In charge of Yamashiro in 1001; he's not getting that!
	1017.7.6 = {
		# Becomes a monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1017.7.9 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000010512 = {
	name = "Shigeyoshi"
	dynasty = 1000027003 # Taira
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010511 # Taira Chikanobu
	# Unclear mother
	975.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Unknown; was the second son
	}
	994.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013855 # Daughter of Fujiwara Michitaka; date unknown, but their son is scripted as born the next year
	}
	1027.1.1 = {
		death = yes # At the earliest
	}
}

		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}

		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			remove_will_not_marry_effect = yes
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}

		death = yes # At the earliest
	}

	name = "Yasuko" # Renshi
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008891 # Prince Motoyasu

		birth = yes # Unknown
	}
	# Married Fujiwara Tokihira
	935.2.5 = {
		death = yes
	}

1000010537 = {
	name = "Motoko"
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008891 # Prince Motoyasu
	# Unknown mother
	873.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Unknown
	}
	889.2.16 = {
		# Saio of Ise 889-897
		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	897.3.1 = { # March
		# No longer Saio
		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			remove_will_not_marry_effect = yes
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	897.4.1 = {
		death = yes # Vanishes from history after March 897
	}
}

	father = 1000010602 # Prince Wake
	# Unknown mother
	740.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Unknown
	}
	765.3.10 = {
		dynasty = 0 # Stripped of imperial status, most likely
	}
	771.9.13 = { # Restored
		dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	}
	790.1.1 = {
		death = yes # After 789
	}
}

##### Abe clan

# Descendants from Emperor Kogen, thus Amaterasu Descendants
# Japanese and English Wikipedia disagree about whether this Abe clan and the Oshu Abe clan are related; having them related is most interesting, so I'm going with that for now

### Abe Omaro and sons

	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = giant # Over six feet tall
	trait = skilled_tactician # Defeated the Minamoto forces at least once
	trait = winter_soldier
	trait = fat # Was known to be fat
	1019.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Had children, but there's not enough info to add them
	1062.10.22 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_execution
			killer = 1000010184 # Minamoto Yoshiie
		}
	}
}

1000011906 = {
	name = "Muneto"
	dynasty = 1100017275 # Abe
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000011904 # Abe Yoritoki
	mother = 1000014167 # Sister of Kiyohara Takenori
	trait = skilled_tactician # Defeated the Minamoto forces at least once
	1032.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Had children, but there's not enough info to add them
	1108.3.18 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

##### Sakanoue clan

# Not Amaterasu Descendants unless there is an intermarriage!
# However, they have a Chinese Imperial bloodline, because their ancestry can be traced back to Emperor Gaozu of Han, which is nothing to scoff at!

### Sakanoue Inukai and Sakanoue Karitamaro

1000011951 = {
	name = "Inukai"
	dynasty = 1100000028 # Sakanoue
	religion = shinto
	culture = han # Will give him Chinese ethnicity; unlikely that it'd show this late in the family, but...
	682.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
		culture = yamato
		create_bloodline = {
			type = blood_of_emperor_ling # TIANXIATODO: Remove once his ancestors are in
		}
	}
	765.1.8 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

	name = "Seongwang"
	dynasty = 1000155053 # Baekje Buyeo
	religion = buddhist

		birth = yes
	}

		name = "Zenko"
		culture = yamato
		dynasty = 1100017345 # Kudara no Konikishi
	}
	693.1.1 = {
		death = yes # Three different dates are given; 687. 693, and 700
	}
}

1000012185 = {
	name = "Shosei" # Or Masanari?
	dynasty = 1100017345 # Kudara no Konikishi
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = yamato
	father = 1000012184 # Kudara no Konikishi Zenko
	644.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Presumably after his father arrived in Japan

##### Nakatomi clan

# Given japanese_monastic_trait and thus Japanese Monastic Feudal since they were Masters of Ceremonies and were in charge of various Shinto rites

# 1000012290-1000012292 used to fix duplicates



##### Konoe clan + Awataguchi clan/descendants

# Hokke Fujiwara cadets, thus Amaterasu Descendants

### Children of Konoe Motozane (1000010080)

1000012293 = {
	name = "Motomichi"
	dynasty = 1100017293 # Konoe
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000010080 # Konoe Motozane
	mother = 1000013864 # Daughter of Fujiwara Tadataka
	trait = naive_appeaser
	1160.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	1174.8.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000010442 # Taira Sadako, daughter of Taira Kiyomori; the Validator will complain, but this is correct
	}
	1178.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000014035 # Minamoto Akiko, daughter of Minamoto Akinobu; date unknown, but they had a son the next year
	}
	1179.11.17 = { # Thanks to a coup by his step-grandfather Taira Kiyomori
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	1184.1.12 = { # Might have been late 1183
		remove_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1184.3.13 = { # Either March 3 or March 13
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	1186.4.10 = { # April 10 or March 14
		remove_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1196.12.16 = { # December 16 or November 25
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = k_chrysanthemum_throne
			}
		}
	}
	1203.2.8 = {
		remove_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1208.8.24 = { # Ordained as a Buddhist monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1233.7.8 = { # On the 8th or the 15th
		death = yes
	}
}

1000012702 = {
	name = "Iezane"
	dynasty = 1100017293 # Konoe
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant

		birth = yes
	}
	1206.4.16 = { # Death of Kujo Yoshitsune; he was formally appointed on the 26th, but we should not have a gap
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = k_chrysanthemum_throne
			}
		}
	}
	1221.5.13 = { # Replaced by Kujo Michiie
		remove_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1221.7.28 = { # Replaces Kujo Michiie
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent

			}
		}

	1229.1.20 = { # Replaced by Kujo Michiie

		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!

			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = k_chrysanthemum_throne
			}
		}
	}
	1330.10.7 = { # Forced to resign
		remove_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	# Was also Kampaku for the Northern Court 1336-1337, but as the Southern Court is the legitimate one (and thus holds k_chrysanthemum_throne) this is irrelevant
	1352.9.21 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

	name = "Tsuneie"
	dynasty = 1100017293 # Konoe
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000012721 # Konoe Tsunetada
	# Unclear mother
	1332.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	1389.1.1 = {
		death = yes
	}

##### Takatsukasa clan

# Hokke Fujiwara cadets, thus Amaterasu Descendants

### Children of Takatsukasa Kanehira (1000012709)

1000012725 = {
	name = "Mototada"
	dynasty = 1100017352 # Takatsukasa
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000012709 # Takatsukasa Kanehira
	# Mother was the daughter of Ichijo Saneari
	trait = poet
	1247.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	1268.12.24 = { # Became Kampaku when Konoe Motohira died
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = k_chrysanthemum_throne
			}
		}
	}
	1273.5.5 = { # Replaced by Kujo Tadaie
		remove_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1312.3.29 = { # Became a Buddhist monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1313.7.30 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}

		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent

		}

		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!

		birth = yes
	}

		remove_trait = under_regency2 # Abdicates to his son

		dynasty = 1100016135 # Ichijo; exact date unclear
	}
	1246.2.15 = {
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = k_chrysanthemum_throne
			}
		}
	}
	1247.1.19 = { # Replaced by Konoe Kanetsune
		remove_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1265.6.3 = { # Replaces Takatsukasa Kanehira
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists
				title = k_chrysanthemum_throne
			}
		}
	}
	1267.12.9 = { # Replaced by Konoe Motohira
		remove_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1284.5.19 = { # Became a Buddhist priest or monk
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1284.8.30 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

	}

1000012791 = {
	name = "Michihira"
	dynasty = 1100017292 # Nijo
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese

	# Unclear mother

		birth = yes
	}
	1316.9.10 = {
		add_trait = japanese_regent
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent

		}

		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1327.2.11 = { #  Replaces Takatsukasa Fuyuhira

			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent

				faction = faction_regency_loyalists

		}

		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!

##### Hojo clan

# Descendants of the Kanmu Heishi (most likely; there are conflicting theories...), thus Amaterasu Descendants

# Several conflicting ancestries given; for now, we're using the following:
# - Taria no Sadamori
# - Taira no Korehira
# - Taira no Koretoki
# - Taira no Naokata
# - Taira no Iekata
# - Taira no Morikata
# - Hojo Tokiie
# - Hojo Takayoshi
# - Hojo Tokimasa

### Descendants of Taira Korehira (1000010422) up to Hojo Tokimasa

1000012803 = {
	name = "Tokimasa"
	dynasty = 1100016129 # Hojo
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000012802 # Hojo Takayoshi
	# Unclear mother
	trait = japanese_feudal_trait
	trait = ambitious
	trait = grey_eminence
	trait = deceitful
	1138.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Might have held Izu and/or Suruga, but we have other characters there...
	1199.2.7 = { # Becomes Shikken
		create_bloodline = {
			type = hojo_bloodline
		}
		add_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists2
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	1204.8.14 = {
		effect = {
			add_rival = 1000012804 # Not on good terms with his daughter at this point
			add_rival = 1000012805 # Not on good terms with his son at this point
			add_rival = 1000010223 # Not on good terms with his grandson at this point
		}
	}
	1205.7.1 = { # Resigns to become a Buddhist monk in July 1205
		add_trait = bhikkhu
		remove_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1215.2.6 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

### Children of Hojo Nobutoki (1000012816)

1000012817 = {
	name = "Munenobu"
	dynasty = 1100016129 # Hojo
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000012816 # Hojo Nobutoki
	# Unknown mother
	trait = japanese_feudal_trait
	1259.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Rokuhara Tandai 1297-1302
	# Rensho 1305-1311
	1311.9.21 = { # Becomes Shikken; actually 1311.10.3, but we don't want a gap
		add_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists2
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	1312.5.29 = { # Replaced
		remove_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1312.7.16 = {

1000012836 = {
	name = "Masamura"
	dynasty = 1100016129 # Hojo
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000012805 # Hojo Yoshitoki
	# Mother was the daughter of Iga Tomomitsu
	trait = child_of_consort
	trait = japanese_feudal_trait
	trait = shy
	trait = kind
	1205.7.10 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Rensho 1256-1264 and 1268-1273
	1264.7.3 = { # Becomes Shikken; actually 1264.8.11, but we don't want a gap
		add_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists2
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	1268.3.5 = { # Replaced
		remove_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1273.6.13 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

		}

### Children of Hojo Takitoki (1000012871)

1000012872 = {
	name = "Hirotoki"
	dynasty = 1100016129 # Hojo
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000012871 # Hojo Takitoki
	# Unclear mother
	trait = japanese_feudal_trait
	1279.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # The Validator doesn't like this...
	}
	# Rensho 1311-1312
	1312.5.29 = { # Became Shikken; actually 1312.6.2, but we don't want a gap
		add_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists2
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	1315.7.12 = { # Replaced and became a monk
		remove_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1315.8.18 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

# Had other, unclear children

### Hojo Yasutoki and his children

1000012889 = {
	name = "Yasutoki"
	dynasty = 1100016129 # Hojo
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000012805 # Hojo Yoshitoki
	# Mother was Awa no Tsubone
	trait = japanese_feudal_trait
	1183.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Tokuso 1224-1242
	# Rokuhara Tandai 1221-1224
	1224.7.1 = { # Became Shikken
		add_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists2
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	1242.6.15 = { # Retired due to illness and became a monk
		remove_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
		add_trait = ill
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1242.7.14 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000012890 = {
	name = "Tokiuji"
	dynasty = 1100016129 # Hojo
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000012889 # Hojo Yasutoki
	# Mother was the daughter of Miura Yoshimura
	trait = japanese_feudal_trait
	1203.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Rokuhara Tandai 1224-1230
	1230.7.29 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!

			}
		}

		remove_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1246.4.19 = { # Became a monk
		add_trait = bhikkhu

1000012894 = {
	name = "Tokiyori"
	dynasty = 1100016129 # Hojo
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000012890 # Hojo Tokiuji
	# Mother was Matsushita Zenni
	trait = japanese_feudal_trait
	trait = ambitious
	trait = midas_touched
	trait = just
	trait = diligent
	trait = kind
	1227.6.29 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Tokuso 1246-1256
	1246.3.23 = { # Became Shikken
		add_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists2
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	1250.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000012854 # Kasai-dono; date unknown
	}
	1256.11.22 = { # Became a monk and retired
		remove_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
		add_trait = bhikkhu
	}
	1263.12.24 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1000012899 = {
	name = "Tokimune"
	dynasty = 1100016129 # Hojo
	religion = buddhist
	trait = mahayana_buddhist
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000012894 # Hojo Tsuneyori
	mother = 1000012854 # Kasai-dono
	trait = japanese_feudal_trait
	trait = brilliant_strategist # Successfully fought the Mongols (with some help from the Divine Wind...)
	trait = cruel # Ruled with an iron fist
	trait = zealous # Promoted Zen Buddhism
	trait = proud
	trait = ambitious
	trait = envious
	1251.6.5 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Rensho 1264-1268
	# Tokuso 1256-1284
	1268.3.5 = { # Became Shikken
		add_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent
			give_minor_title = title_appointed_regent
			start_faction = {
				faction = faction_regency_loyalists2
				title = e_japan
			}
		}
	}
	1284.4.4 = { # Replaced
		remove_trait = japanese_regent2
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent
		}
	}
	1284.4.20 = {
		add_trait = bhikkhu # Took tonsure on the day he died
		death = yes
	}
}

			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			give_minor_title = title_regent

				faction = faction_regency_loyalists2

		remove_trait = japanese_regent2

			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer # No pitting the PR under someone else!
			remove_title = title_regent
			remove_title = title_appointed_regent

##### Additional members of the Imperial Family, including early/legendary members

# The Validator will have complaints here, but it can't be helped

### Emperor Jimmu and his children

1000012949 = {
	name = "Hikohohodemi" # Emperor Jimmu
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	# Father was Ugayafukiaezu no Mikoto
	# Mother was Tamayori-hime
	trait = genius
	trait = ambitious
	trait = zealous
	trait = grey_eminence
	trait = kinslayer # Killed Tagashimimi, his own son
	1.2.13 = { # 711 BCE
		birth = yes
		create_bloodline = {
			type = blood_of_emperor_jimmu # For tracking of agnates
		}
	}
	2.2.11 = { # 660 BCE
		name = "Jimmu"
	}
	# Married Himetataraisuzu-hime, daughter of Kotoshironushi
	# Consorts:
	# Ahiratsu-hime, daughter of Ninigi-no-Mikoto
	17.4.9 = { # 585 BCE
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		immortal_age = 126
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000012950 = {
	name = "Tagashimimi"
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000012949 # Emperor Jimmu
	# Mother was Ahiratsu-hime
	trait = ambitious
	trait = flamboyant_schemer
	trait = deceitful
	trait = envious
	trait = child_of_consort
	1.2.14 = {
		birth = yes # Was the oldest son
	}
	17.2.14 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_execution # Or possibly murder...
			killer = 1000012949 # Jimmu
		}
	}
}

1000012955 = {
	name = "Kamununakawamimi" # Emperor Suizei
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant

		birth = yes # Third oldest son

		name = "Suizei"

		add_trait = dead_tenno

			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}

		name = "Korei"

	# Married Kuwashi-hime, daughter of Shiki no Agatanushi Oome
	# Consorts:
	# - Kasuga no Chichihayamawaka-hime
	# - Yamato no Kunika-hime, daughter of Wachitsumi
	# - Haeirodo, sister of the above
	20.3.23 = { # 215 BCE
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		immortal_age = 127
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}

### Children of Emperor Korei

1000012968 = {
	name = "Oyamatonekohikokunikuru" # Emperor Kogen
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family

	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000012967 # Emperor Korei
	# Mother was Kuwashi-hime
	5.1.1 = { # 273 BCE
		birth = yes
	}
	8.2.21 = { # 214 BCE
		name = "Kogen"
	}
	# Married Utsushikome, daughter of Oyakuchisukune
	# Consorts:
	# - Ikagashikome, daughter of Ohesoki
	# - Haniyasu-hime, daughter of Kawachi-no-Aotamakake
	22.10.14 = { # 158 BCE
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		immortal_age = 115
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000012994 = {
	name = "Ikumeirihikoisachi" # Emperor Suinin
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000012981 # Emperor Sujin
	mother = 1000012993 # Mimaki-hime
	trait = zealous
	trait = mastermind_theologian
	10.1.26 = { # 69 BCE
		birth = yes # Was the third son, but it's unclear which of his brothers were older than him
	}
	11.2.28 = { # February 29, 69 BCE
		name = "Suinin"
	}
	14.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000012990 # Empress Sahohime
	}
	16.1.1 = {
		remove_spouse = 1000012990 # Empress Sahohime
		add_consort = 1000012990 # Empress Sahohime
		add_spouse = 1000012992 # Empress Hibasuhime
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Nubataniiri-hime, daughter of Prince Tanba-no-Michinoushi
	# - Matono-hime, daughter of Prince Tanba-no-Michinoushi
	# - Azaminiiri-hime, daughter of Prince Tanba-no-Michinoushi
	# - Kaguya-hime, daughter of Prince Ootsutsukitarine
	17.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013215
	}
	# - Kanihatatobe, daughter of Yamashiro no Ookuni no Fuchi
	70.8.8 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		immortal_age = 139
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government

1000013226 = { # Prince Takeru

		birth = yes

		add_trait = kinslayer # Killed his brother
	}

		name = "Takeru"
	}
	100.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013218 # Princess Futajiiri-hime
	}

		death = yes
	}
}

1000013276 = {
	name = "Tarashinakahiko" # Emperor Chuai
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000013226 # Prince Takeru
	mother = 1000013218 # Princess Futajiiri-hime
	trait = attractive # Had a countenance of perfect beauty
	trait = giant # Supposedly ten feet tall
	149.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	192.2.11 = {
		name = "Chuai"
		add_spouse = 1000012989 # Empress Jingu; date unknown
		add_consort = 1000009297 # Queen Himiko; sometimes believed to be the same as Empress Jingu
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Onakatsu-hime, daughter of Prince Hikohitooe
	193.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013277 # Date unknown
	}
	# - Oto-hime, daughter of Osakanushi
	200.3.8 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = {
			death_reason = death_battle
		}
	}
}

### Children of Emperor Chuai

1000013278 = {
	name = "Homutawake" # Emperor Ojin
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000013276 # Emperor Chuai
	mother = 1000012989 # Empress Jingu
	trait = brilliant_strategist # He's Hachiman!
	trait = duelist
	201.1.5 = {
		birth = yes # The Validator complains, but this is correct... obviously assuming Jingu is being completely honest...
	}
	250.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013283 # Nakatsu-hime, daughter of Prince Homudamawaka; date unknown, but this is before Nintoku's birth
		add_consort = 1000013284 # Takakiiri-hime, daughter of Prince Homudamawaka; date unknown
	}
	251.1.1 = {
		add_consort = 1000013285 # Oto-hime, daughter of Prince Homudamawaka; date unknown
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Miyanushiyaka-hime, daughter of Wani no Hifure no Omi
	# - Onabe-hime, daughter of Wani no Hifure no Omi
	# - Okinaga Mawakanakatsu-hime, daughter of Kawamata Nakatsuhiko
	# - Ito-hime, daughter of Sakuraitabe no Muraji Shimatarine
	# - Himuka no Izumi no Naga-hime
	# - Kaguro-hime, daughter of Sumeiroonakatsuhiko
	# - Katsuragi no Irome, daughter of Takenouchi no Sukune
	# - E-hime, daughter of Kibi-no-Takehiko
	270.2.8 = {
		name = "Ojin"
	}
	310.3.31 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

		name = "Nintoku"

		add_spouse = 1000013300 # Date unknown

	# - Himuka no Kaminaga-hime, daughter of Morokata no Kimi Ushimoroi

		birth = yes
	}

	352.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000013321 # Date unknown
	}
	400.3.12 = {
		name = "Richu"
	}
	# Consorts:
	# - Kuro-hime, daughter of Katsuragi no Ashita no Sukune
	# - Futohime no Iratsume, daughter of Prince Funashiwake
	# - Takatsuru no Iratsume, daughter of Prince Funashiwake
	405.4.29 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		add_trait = ill
		death = {
			death_reason = death_trait
		}
	}
}

	name = "Ohatsuse" # Emperor Buretsu # Ohatsuse no Wakasazaki

	culture = yamato

	mother = 1000013344 # Princess Kasuga no Oiratsume

	trait = cruel
	trait = proud
	trait = arbitrary
	trait = hedonist
	trait = indulgent_wastrel
	trait = lustful
	489.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	498.9.9 = {
		name = "Buretsu"
	}
	# Married Kasuga no Iratsume
	507.1.7 = {
		add_trait = dead_tenno
		effect_even_if_dead = {
			set_government_type = japanese_imperial_government
			set_special_character_title = TENNO
		}
		death = yes
	}
}

1000013380 = {
	name = "Iwakumahime"
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = yamato
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000008703 # Emperor Kinmei
	# Mother was Soga no Kitashihime
	trait = child_of_consort
	550.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Unknown
	}
	560.1.1 = { # Saio of Ise; date unknown
		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	578.1.1 = { # Forced to resign; might have been earlier
		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			remove_will_not_marry_effect = yes
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	580.1.1 = {
		death = yes # Unknown
	}
}

		effect = {
			set_character_flag = got_surname
		}
	}
	937.1.1 = {
		death = yes # Unknown; this date leaves her alive in the IC start
	}
}

### Extra children of Emperor Go-Toba (dates unknown for the most part)

1000013477 = {
	name = "Sumiko" # Shukushi
	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027000 # Imperial Family
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000009145 # Emperor Go-Toba
	# Mother was Hyoe-no-kami no Tsubone
	trait = child_of_consort
	1196.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	# Saio of Ise 1199-1210?
	1199.1.1 = {
		add_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			will_not_marry_effect = yes
			set_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	1210.1.1 = {
		remove_trait = imperial_priestess
		effect = {
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_marriage
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_refuse_conversion
			remove_will_not_marry_effect = yes
			clr_character_flag = ai_flag_never_transfer
		}
	}
	1230.1.1 = {
		death = yes # Unknown
	}
}

	name = "Norimasa"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese

		birth = yes # Unknown; was the fifth son

		add_trait = japanese_monastic_trait # Hands over the shrine to his son Norimasa
	}
	1155.12.27 = {
		remove_trait = japanese_monastic_trait # Usurped by his brother following his father's death
	}
	1156.1.1 = {
		death = yes # After his father
	}
}

	name = "Michinori" # Shinzei
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant
	father = 1000013653 # Fujiwara Sanekane

	trait = lustful # Had 24 children (some too unclear to add)
	1102.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	1144.8.22 = {
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
		add_trait = zealous # Very insistent on becoming a monk
		name = "Shinzei"
	}
	1155.1.1 = {
		effect = {
			add_rival = 1000009916 # Fujiwara Nobuyori
		}
	}
	1160.1.23 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_execution
			killer = 1000009916 # Fujiwara Nobuyori (or his Minamoto allies)
		}
	}
}

	female = yes
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	trait = amaterasu_descendant

	mother = 1000012119 # Takashina Takako

		birth = yes # After Genshi, before Mikushige-dono-no-Betto
	}
	# Married Prince Atsumichi
	1040.1.1 = {
		death = yes # Unknown
	}
}

# Sidebar with Fujiwaras

1000014090 = {
	name = "Atsunobu"
	dynasty = 1000027001 # Fujiwara
	religion = shinto
	culture = japanese
	#trait = amaterasu_descendant # Unclear branch of the family...
	# Father was Fujiwara Norishige/Aishige; no idea about his connection to the wider Fujiwara clan...
	# Mother was the daughter of Minamoto Hitoshi
	trait = poet
	970.1.1 = {
		birth = yes # Unknown; had a son in 989
	}
	988.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 1000014170 # Daughter of Tachibana Tsunehira; date unknown
	}
	1030.1.1 = {
		# Became a monk towards the end of his life
		religion = buddhist
		add_trait = mahayana_buddhist
		add_trait = bhikkhu
		death = yes # Unknown
	}
}
